ingredients.ingredient: 10 ounces fresh young ginger root, peeled

cookingTips: Young ginger has thinner skin and is less fibrous - easier to candy
Simmer ginger slowly in sugar syrup to infuse flavor throughout
Reserve leftover syrup for ginger tea or cocktails
